benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/credits - Create a credit

covered: Valid Payload Coverage: TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC06, TC07 demonstrate creation with valid inputs and variations (single/multi-item, invoiceId, autoCommit, and headers).
Edge & Boundary Coverage: TC21, TC22, TC23, TC24, TC25 cover empty body, extra fields, maximum credits, large payloads, and timeouts.

Error Handling & Validation Coverage: TC08/TC09 for 404s on missing account/invoice; TC10/TC11/TC12/TC14/TC15/TC16/TC13 cover missing header, malformed JSON, missing required fields, invalid IDs, invalid currency, and amount direction. TC19/TC20 cover security inputs (SQLi and XSS).
Authorization & Availability Coverage: TC18 for 403; TC17 and TC28 for 503; TC29 for plugin errors in integration.
Regression & Performance & Accessibility Coverage: TC30 idempotency; TC31 backward compatibility; TC32-34 performance tests; TC35 accessibility/docs.
gaps: Rate limiting tests are missing (multiple requests per unit time).
401 Unauthorized authentication tests are not explicit (only 403 for insufficient permissions).
500 Internal Server Error scenario (DB failure) is not explicitly tested.
Caching headers for POST responses (ETag/Cache-Control) are not tested.
Detailed negative path under network failure retries (idempotency under failure) could be expanded.
recommendations: Add rate limiting tests to verify throttling behavior under bursts.
Add tests for 401 Unauthorized when credentials are missing or invalid.
Add explicit 500 Internal Server Error test to cover DB/service failures.
Add tests for caching headers on POST responses if caching is applicable (or confirm non-caching).
Enhance idempotency tests to cover retries after partial failures or network issues.
Clarify behavior for TC13 to ensure consistent handling of positive amounts across environments.
